Text:
I installed official 4.2 update from   http://www.forteinc.com over my 4.1 cracked version. I didn't launch Agent 4.2 to see if it works (I should have just to see), I directly followed instructions and applied the 4.2 patch.

It's working fine for me :)

Thanks to the releaser :)

file virus scanned and comes clean via nd32 and kasperski server scanner.
